attributes.action: Provide protection for whistle-blowers like Brian Pead against State abuse.
attributes.background: After exposing child abuse in Lambeth Council, Brian Pead was unlawfully dismissed, improperly defamed, wrongly imprisoned on four occasions, deliberately separated from his beloved family and made homeless. His MP has now accepted that Brian is "a victim of a number of miscarriages of justice."

rejection.details:
We cannot accept your petition in its current form as it does not include a clear action for either the UK Government or Parliament. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Also, we cannot accept petitions regarding criminal investigations or prosecutions, because the police and Director for Public Prosecutions are operationally independent.

The Independent Police Complaints Commission, not the Government or Parliament, conducts independent investigations of the police. You can find out more about the IPCC, including how to make a complaint, here:

https://www.ipcc.gov.uk/complaints
